info.title: Lines & Services

changes: Remove date parameters in the different end-point

info.description:
Get details of our multiple Trade Line offers for all carriers of the group.

Given a specific Line or Service this API returns operational data like Loop routing details, Service frequency, Ports & Terminals information, Transit time, Vessels fleet,â€¦).

get.summary: search services by departure / arrival zones
get.description: Get the service code activated for the commercial voyages

parameters.name: zoneFromCode
parameters.description:
Departure zone code Available values are:
  • `WEUR` for Europe
  • `ASIE` for Asia
  • `MED` for Mediterranean
  • `CARAIBES` for Caribbean and Central America
  • `AFR` for Africa
  • `ANZPAC` for Oceania
  • `MDLEAST` for Middle East
  • `NA` for North America
  • `SA` for South America
  • `ALL` for any zone

parameters.name: zoneToCode
parameters.description:
Arrival zone code. Available values are:
  • `WEUR` for Europe
  • `ASIE` for Asia
  • `MED` for Mediterranean
  • `CARAIBES` for Caribbean and Central America
  • `AFR` for Africa
  • `ANZPAC` for Oceania
  • `MDLEAST` for Middle East
  • `NA` for North America
  • `SA` for South America
  • `ALL` for any zone

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Pagination parameter. default 0-49. Maximum rows to return 50

200.description: Returns services related to selected zones

400.description:
hereunder fault datatype description
Reason - 400 Bad request
Code - SRV_ERR Description - Bad request parameters unknown
Code - ZON_ERR Description - Unknown zone code

404.description:

carriers.description: Shipping Companies on which service is exposed

frequency.description:
Service frequency (in days)
e.g. '1' for Daily, '7' for weekly, etc

departureDay.description: Departure Day on Regular service for weekly or fortnightly departure

shipcomp.description: Shipping Company - detail in referential.shipping.company API

code.description: Internal Vessel code - detail in referential.vessel API

smdgLinerCode.description: SMDG Liner code as per SMDG referential https://smdg.org

transitTime.description: transit time from start of service (in days)

unLocode.description: UN/Locode - UN codification of the port

name.description: English description as per provider's referential (e.g. Marseille)

codificationType.description: type of codification such as UN/Locode, GLN, Coordinate

codification.description: value related to the codification, if codification is UN/Locode, value will be location UN Locode value

reason.description: HTTP error or Free text such as  Database Not Available , Invalid Credential, Mandatory, Invalid Format,  Invalid Length, ForbiddenValue, Invalid Data,...

code.description: Error Id,  Server Application error ID, Oracle error Id, ....

description.description: Human-readable error description including Data and Value
